name: My Number One Feature Request For iOS 6
content:
**Fix the Snooze button**! I have no idea how this UI component got to Apple’s review team and they were like ”*Yep, that looks beautiful! Ship it!*”. If Apple changes the snooze button and slaps a 6 on iOS, I will be happy. If not, more rants to follow. Stay tuned…. [][1]
Tweet
[1]: /uploads/2012/photo.png
title: My Number One Feature Request For iOS 6
